title: Rob Pike goes nuclear over GenAI

title: Rob Pike Goes Nuclear over GenAI

title: FFmpeg has issued a DMCA takedown on GitHub
author: merlindru
aiHeadline: FFmpeg is so serious about their code that they just sent a DMCA takedown to GitHub, because apparently, even the internet needs a time-out.
